scenes.headline: Let your capital move intelligently.
scenes.body: Deposit once. Hyper Strategies automatically routes capital between strategies and safety mechanisms.

scenes.headline: The money flow.
scenes.body: 80% to active strategies. 20% to Safety Fund, Farming, and Token Seeding.

scenes.headline: Our strategies.
scenes.body: Core Strategy (balanced, high-cap focus) and High-Risk (volatile pairs, higher drawdown tolerance).

scenes.headline: Inside a strategy.
scenes.body: Signals → positions → risk controls → rebalance → realize PnL → compound.

scenes.headline: Security & protection.
scenes.body: Deposit split reinforces Safety Fund and selective Farming; token seeding aligns long-term incentives.

scenes.headline: Fees & high-watermark.
scenes.body: 20% performance fee only on new profits above your highest equity peak.

scenes.headline: Rewards, XP & tiers.
scenes.body: Earn through Rewards Center, climb Account Tiers with XP, and track Leaderboards.

scenes.headline: Reporting & syndicates.
scenes.body: Personal dashboards, public quarterly reports, and community syndicates. Withdrawals flow back to you.

infoCards.title: Farming Protocols
infoCards.body: Selective yield strategies to diversify income streams.

infoCards.title: Buyback Engine
infoCards.body: Directs revenue to periodic buybacks to support the ecosystem.

infoCards.title: Rewards Center & Tiers
infoCards.body: Earn points, level up tiers with XP, and unlock benefits.

infoCards.title: Reporting & Syndicates
infoCards.body: Personal reports, public quarters, and collaborative syndicate options.
